entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to lower to about 500 metres early Wednesday morning. 10 to 20 cm may accumulate about Homer Tunnel during the morning and afternoon with lesser amounts down to 500 metres. In the evening, snow showers become confined south of Lake Gunn where a further 1 to 2 cm may accumulate on the road above 300 metres.
